content.question: Which of the following best explains the depiction of George Washington in the painting?

choices.label: The development of a sense of American identity among Patriots
The attempts of colonists to gain support for declaring independence
The desire of colonists to commemorate conquests over Native Americans
The tensions between northern and southern colonies during the Revolutionary War

content.answer: The development of a sense of American identity among Patriots

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
